MonsterTrait.Name: Insanity
MonsterTrait.Text: Droki has advantage on saving throws against being charmed or frightened.

MonsterTrait.Name: Magic Resistance
MonsterTrait.Text: The derro has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

MonsterTrait.Name: Spellcasting
MonsterTrait.Text:
Narrak is a 5th-level spellcaster. His spellcasting ability is Charisma (Save DC 13, +5 to hit with spell attacks) Narrak has two 2nd-level spell slots, which he regains after finishing a short or long rest, and knows the following Warlock spells:
Cantrips (at will): eldritch blast, friends, poison spray 1st level: armor of Agathys, charm person, hex 2nd level: hold person, ray of enfeeblement, spider climb

MonsterTrait.Name: Sunlight Sensitivity
MonsterTrait.Text: While in sunlight, the derro has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

MonsterTrait.Name: Armor of Shadows (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
MonsterTrait.Text: Narrak casts mage armor on himself

MonsterAction.Name: Shortsword
MonsterAction.Text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit:5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

MonsterTrait.Name: One with Shadows
MonsterTrait.Text: While he is in a dim light or darkness, Narrak can become invisible. He remains so until he moves or takes an action or reaction.
